languages.text: "Утверждение, предрекающее процветание, ложно. Догматы безопасности, базирующиеся на обширной статистике конфронтаций с ксенорасами, содержат ноль случаев успешного сосуществования в одном жизненном пространстве".

traits.locale_text: "Это утверждение ложно. Догматы безопасности базируются на обширной статистике конфронтаций с ксенорасами, содержащей ноль случаев успешного сосуществования в одном жизненном пространстве".

languages.text: "The statement predicting future success is fallacious. Security dogmas are based on extensive statistical data on confrontations with xenoraces, and there have been zero cases of successful coexistence."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение, предрекающее процветание, ложно. Догматы безопасности, базирующиеся на обширной статистике конфронтаций с ксенорасами, содержат ноль случаев успешного сосуществования в одном жизненном пространстве".

traits.locale_text: "The statement predicting future success is fallacious. Security dogmas are based on extensive statistical data on confrontations with xenoraces, and there have been zero cases of successful coexistence."
"This statement is false. Security dogmas are based on extensive statistics of confrontations with xenos races, containing zero cases of successful coexistence in one living space.

"The statement predicting future success is fallacious. Security dogmas are based on extensive statistical data on confrontations with xenoraces, and there have been zero cases of successful coexistence."
"This statement is false. Security dogmas are based on extensive statistical data of confrontations with xenos races, containing zero cases of successful coexistence."

"The statement predicting future success is fallacious. Security dogmas are based on extensive statistical data on confrontations with xenoraces, and there have been zero cases of successful coexistence."

"The statement predicting future success is fallacious. Security dogmas are based on extensive statistical data on confrontations with xenoraces, and there have been zero cases of successful coexistence."

languages.text: “对未来的预测结果显示，和平共处的前景渺茫。安全教条是基于与异形对抗的大量统计数据得来的，双方顺利和平共处的案例为零。”
languages.original_text: "The statement predicting future success is fallacious. Security dogmas are based on extensive statistical data on confrontations with xenoraces, and there have been zero cases of successful coexistence."

traits.locale_text: “对未来的预测结果显示，和平共处的前景渺茫。安全教条是基于与异形对抗的大量统计数据得来的，双方顺利和平共处的案例为零。”

languages.text: 「将来的な成功を期待した声明など儚いものです。セキュリティドグマは異種族との対立に関する広範な統計データに基づいて構築されたもの。これまでに共存が成功した例は0件です」
languages.original_text: "The statement predicting future success is fallacious. Security dogmas are based on extensive statistical data on confrontations with xenoraces, and there have been zero cases of successful coexistence."

traits.locale_text: 「将来的な成功を期待した声明など儚いものです。セキュリティドグマは異種族との対立に関する広範な統計データに基づいて構築されたもの。これまでに共存が成功した例は0件です」

languages.text: "Die Aussage, die Erfolg in der Zukunft vorhersagt, ist abwegig. Die Sicherheitsdogmen basieren auf umfassenden statistischen Daten über Begegnungen mit Xenovölkern, und erfolgreiche Koexistenz gab es bisher genau null mal."
languages.original_text: "The statement predicting future success is fallacious. Security dogmas are based on extensive statistical data on confrontations with xenoraces, and there have been zero cases of successful coexistence."

traits.locale_text: "Die Aussage, die Erfolg in der Zukunft vorhersagt, ist abwegig. Die Sicherheitsdogmen basieren auf umfassenden statistischen Daten über Begegnungen mit Xenovölkern, und erfolgreiche Koexistenz gab es bisher genau null mal."

languages.text: « Ces prévisions d'un avenir prospère sont erronées. Les dogmes de sécurité se basent sur de nombreuses données statistiques concernant les confrontations avec des espèces xénos, et aucun cas de coexistence réussie n'a jamais été relevé. »
languages.original_text: "The statement predicting future success is fallacious. Security dogmas are based on extensive statistical data on confrontations with xenoraces, and there have been zero cases of successful coexistence."

traits.locale_text: « Ces prévisions d'un avenir prospère sont erronées. Les dogmes de sécurité se basent sur de nombreuses données statistiques concernant les confrontations avec des espèces xénos, et aucun cas de coexistence réussie n'a jamais été relevé. »

languages.text: «El enunciado que predice el éxito futuro es una falacia. Los dogmas de seguridad se basan en estadísticas exhaustivas de previos enfrentamientos con las razas xenos, y se han dado un total de cero casos de coexistencia exitosa».
languages.original_text: "The statement predicting future success is fallacious. Security dogmas are based on extensive statistical data on confrontations with xenoraces, and there have been zero cases of successful coexistence."

traits.locale_text: «El enunciado que predice el éxito futuro es una falacia. Los dogmas de seguridad se basan en estadísticas exhaustivas de previos enfrentamientos con las razas xenos, y se han dado un total de cero casos de coexistencia exitosa».

languages.text: "Gelecekte başarı beklendiğini ifade eden bu tahmin, mantıklı değil. Güvenlik olasılığı, zeno ırklarıyla aynı ortamda bulunma durumlarına dair kapsamlı istatistiksel verilere dayanır. Zenolar ve insanlar, asla başarılı bir şekilde bir arada yaşamamıştır."
languages.original_text: "The statement predicting future success is fallacious. Security dogmas are based on extensive statistical data on confrontations with xenoraces, and there have been zero cases of successful coexistence."

traits.locale_text: "Gelecekte başarı beklendiğini ifade eden bu tahmin, mantıklı değil. Güvenlik olasılığı, zeno ırklarıyla aynı ortamda bulunma durumlarına dair kapsamlı istatistiksel verilere dayanır. Zenolar ve insanlar, asla başarılı bir şekilde bir arada yaşamamıştır."
